CustomField.formula: IF( EV_CampaignId__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'EV_Eventos_Accionistas', $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlAccionistaPortal__c , $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlPortal__c ) & IF( EV_CampaignId__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'EV_Eventos_Accionistas', $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_index__c, $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_Inscripcion__c) & IF(ISBLANK(EV_LeadId__c), IF(ISBLANK(EV_ContactId__c),IF(ISBLANK(EV_AccountId__c),'es',CASE(EV_AccountId__r.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(EV_ContactId__r.Account.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(EV_LeadId__r.EV_Idiomas__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')) & $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_html__c & '?idEvento=' & EV_CampaignId__r.EV_ExternalID__c & '&idInvitacion='& EV_ExternalID__c
CustomField.label: URL de Registro
